weka.classifiers.mllib

Class MLlibClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.mllib.MLlibClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.BatchPredictor, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MLlibDecisionTree, MLlibGradientBoostedTrees, MLlibLinearRegressionSGD, MLlibLogistic, MLlibNaiveBayes, MLlibRandomForest, MLlibSVM

    public abstract class MLlibClassifier
extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract base class for Weka MLlib wrapper classifiers.
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:

      • buildClassifier

        public void buildClassifier(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<weka.core.Instance> wekaData,
                            weka.core.Instances headerWithSummary,
                            java.util.List<weka.filters.StreamableFilter> preprocessors,
                            CachingStrategy strategy)
                     throws weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException
        Build the classifier. Takes an RDD of Instance objects and creates a dataset that can be processed by the underlying MLlib scheme.
        Parameters:
        wekaData - an RDD of Instance objects
        headerWithSummary - the header of the data (with summary attributes)
        preprocessors - streamable filters to apply to the data. Used when this classifier is executed on data sourced by big data sources in a cluster - e.g. data frame read from a CSV file in HDFS via the CSV data frame source. When the classifier is running in desktop Weka, and data has been loaded into main memory (and then parallelized) all of Weka's filters can be used in the normal way (i.e. via a FilteredClassifier wrapped around the filter(s) and this classifier).
        strategy - the caching strategy to use
        Throws:
        weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException - if a problem occurs

      • learnModel

        public abstract void learnModel(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<weka.core.Instance> wekaData,
                                weka.core.Instances headerWithSummary,
                                java.util.List<weka.filters.StreamableFilter> preprocessors,
                                CachingStrategy strategy)
                         throws weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException
        Learn the underlying MLlib model. Subclasses to implement for their specific MLlib scheme
        Parameters:
        wekaData - an RDD of Instance objects
        headerWithSummary -
        preprocessors - streamable filters for preprocessing the data
        strategy - the header of the data (with summary attributes)
        Throws:
        weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException - if a problem occurs

      • predict

        public double predict(org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector test)
               throws weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException
        Predict a test point using the learned model
        Parameters:
        test - a Vector containing the test point
        Returns:
        the predicted value (index of class for classification, or actual value for regression)

                               throws weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException

        Returns:
